ja481:7.2: Kareyya saṃ → kareyyāsaṃ (s2, s3) | kareyya sa (mr) | bhareyya saṃ (?), kāḷikāyaṃ → kālikāya (s2, s3) | kālikāyaṃ (pts1) | kāḷikāya (mr)
ja481:8.1: yujjhamānānamayujjhamāno → yujjhamānānaṃ ayujjhamāno (s2, s3) | yujjhamānena ayujjhamāno (mr)
ja481:10.3: galakāvakantaṃ → galakaṃ vikantā (s2, s3) | galayā vikantuṃ (mr)
ja481:11.2: atthavasaṃ gatā me → atthavasāhatā ime (bj) | atthavasābhatā ime (s2, s3, pts1)
ja481:11.4: Ekaṃ punappātarāse → ekañca puna pātarāse (bj) | ekañca naṃ pātarāse (pts1)
ja481:14.3: Tvaṃ nāthosi → tvaṃ-nātho'smi (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja481:14.4: nāthohaṃ bhariyāya me → amha-nāthā mama bhariyā (bj, s2, s3) | nāthohaṃ bhariyāya ca (pts1)
ja481:16.1: paricitto aticitto → paracittena acitto (bj) | paracittena aticitto (s2, s3) | paracitto acitto (pts1)
